reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Advancing People-Centered Quality TB Care – From the New Model of Care Towards Improving DR-TB Early Detection and Treatment Outcomes

description.narrative: Multicountry EECA PAS - Tuberculosis - Center for Health Policies and Studies - PAS Center. This program has the following goals: To improve early DR-TB case detection and patient care outcomes in eleven Eastern European and Central Asian countries through meaningful involvement of communities and civil society and integrated patient-centered TB care delivery systems able to address the needs of key and vulnerable populations.. The objectives of this program are: To ensure full engagement of communities and civil society in TB prevention and care for improving TB and DR-TB case detection and patient care outcomes.. To strengthen health systems to enable integrated patient-centered TB and DR-TB care delivery systems for meeting challenges and addressing the needs of key populations.

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for QMZ-T-PAS
TB - Other 4: Average length of hospital stay, MDR-TB cases, days
TB - Other 3: Percentage of MDR-TB patients hospitalized
TB - Other 1: Percentage of new TB cases hospitalized
TB - Other 2: Average length of hospital stay, new TB cases, days
Impact indicator for QMZ-T-PAS
RR-TB and/or MDR-TB prevalence among new TB patients: Proportion of new TB cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB
TB mortality rate per 100,000 population
Outcome indicator for QMZ-T-PAS
TB O-Other 1: Average length of hospital stay, MDR-TB cases, days
Treatment success rate of RR TB and/or MDR-TB: Percentage of cases with RR and/or MDR-TB successfully treated
Notification of RR-TB and/or MDR-TB cases – Percentage of notified cases of bacteriologically confirmed, drug resistant RR-TB and/or MDR-TB as a proportion of all estimated RR-TB and/or MDR-TB cases

TB treatment coverage: Percentage of new and relapse cases that were notified and treated among the estimated number of incident TB cases in the same year (all form of TB - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed)
Treatment success rate of all forms of TB - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, new and relapse cases
TB O- Other 5: Percentage of countries which have operational plans to incorporate efficient payment models and sustainable financing models for TB care.
TB O- Other 1: Percentage of countries which have adopted a key policy to address the grant's strategic areas (patient centered-TB service delivery, TB care financing and TB HR).
TB O- Other 3: Percentage of countries with increased TB share (%) out of the health sector budget during the grant implementation.
TB O- Other 2: Percentage of countries with agreed regional hospitalization and discharge criteria for susceptible and MDR-TB patients adopted
TB O- Other 4: TB domestic expenditure as a percentage (%) of total government expenditure on health care
